title: Central Learning Hub Expansion
description: Help us expand our after-school learning center to accommodate 100 more students with new classrooms and equipment.

title: Digital Skills Training Program
description: Provide laptops and coding workshops to help students develop essential digital skills for the future job market.

title: English Tutoring Program
description: Our tutoring program in Eastern district has provided over 30 kids with better access to language educational resources.

title: Science Laboratory Equipment
description: Upgrade science labs with modern microscopes, chemistry sets, and safety equipment for hands-on learning.

title: English Language Support
description: Fund native English speaker tutors and interactive language learning materials for immigrant students.

title: Computer Literacy Program
description: Provide refurbished computers and basic IT training for students from low-income families.

title: Creative Arts Studio
description: Build a dedicated space for music, art, and drama activities with instruments and art supplies.

title: Mathematics Excellence Program
description: Advanced math tutoring and competition preparation for gifted students in underserved communities.

title: Sports and Recreation Center
description: Create a safe space for physical activities with sports equipment and trained coaches.

title: Mobile Library Project
description: Fund a mobile library van that brings books and reading programs to remote areas.

title: Environmental Education Program
description: Teach students about sustainability through hands-on environmental projects and field trips.

title: Rural School Transportation
description: Provide safe and reliable transportation for students in remote villages to access education.

title: Special Needs Support Center
description: Establish specialized facilities and hire trained staff for students with learning disabilities.

title: STEM Innovation Lab
description: Build a modern laboratory for robotics, 3D printing, and engineering projects.

title: Mental Health Support Program
description: Provide counseling services and mental health resources for students and families.

title: Vocational Training Workshop
description: Prepare students for trades and technical careers with hands-on workshop training.

title: Marine Conservation Education
description: Ocean science programs and boat trips to teach students about marine ecosystem protection.

title: Island Schools Support Network
description: Internet connectivity and remote learning support for students on outlying islands.
